markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Autumn's Embrace](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1840)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 14 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 2,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Leaf Weave](/Armor.aspx?ID=28)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Woven by [fey](/Traits.aspx?ID=69) seamstresses as rewards for servants of nature, countless leaves continually changing colors in autumnal hues comprise autumn's embrace, a suit of _+2 [invisibility](/Equipment.aspx?ID=287) [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [leaf weave](/Armor.aspx?ID=28)_. Leaves shed from the armor as they might fall in autumn. When activating the armor's _invisibility_ property rune, you disappear in a swirl of colorful leaves.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=542), [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You call forth a storm of leaves from _autumn's embrace_. These leaves swirl in a 20-foot emanation for 1 minute. Creatures within the area are [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4), and creatures outside the area are concealed to creatures within the leaves. However, you can see through this concealment. You can Dismiss the activation.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Autumn's Embrace

text: <title level="1" right="Item 12" pfs="Standard" > Autumn's Embrace Source Treasure Vault pg. 14 2.0 Price 2,000 gp Usage worn armor Bulk 1 Base Armor Leaf Weave --- Woven by fey seamstresses as rewards for servants of nature, countless leaves continually changing colors in autumnal hues comprise autumn's embrace, a suit of +2 invisibility resilient leaf weave . Leaves shed from the armor as they might fall in autumn. When activating the armor's invisibility property rune, you disappear in a swirl of colorful leaves. Activate Two Actions (aura, concentrate) Frequency once per day; Effect You call forth a storm of leaves from autumn's embrace . These leaves swirl in a 20-foot emanation for 1 minute. Creatures within the area are concealed, and creatures outside the area are concealed to creatures within the leaves. However, you can see through this concealment. You can Dismiss the activation.
